COMMENT_TX: 41 minute rain delay after one pitch to Brandon Inge
$Tigers Magglio Ordonez left the game with a broken right ankle, which he suffered after turning his ankle during batting practice

$Victor Martinez checked his swing and reacted as if hit by the ball; HP umpire Larry Vanover asked 1B umpire Jim Wolf if Martinez swung; when the ball rolled to the backstop and catcher Mike Napoli did not run after it, Miguel Cabrera ran from 2B to home, apparently scoring a run; the umpires huddled and called the pitch a hit batter, placing Martinez on 1B and putting Cabrera back on 2B

$SS Elvis Andrus closed his throwing hand over his glove before the ball was in the glove; the ball hit the back of his hand and bounced; Andrus closed both hands over the ball against his chest to trap the ball and make the catch
$Nelson Cruz hit the first game-ending grand slam in post-season history
2:13 rain delay before start; much of game played in the rain
$this is the first time in post-season history that a team has hit a single, double, triple and home run in order in the same inning
$the fifth homer in this LCS by Nelson Cruz; Cruz becomes the first player to hit five homers in one LCS
$sixth home run for Nelson Cruz in the ALCS, sets record for most by one player in a postseason series
